description_html:
Description

The “LE TRAY square table curved legs" is a square coffee table with metal finish legs. It is a part of our Heritage Collection. Designed with tradition, comfort and elegance in mind, crafted by hand, it is directly inspired by our Caribbean island Tray.

Husband and Wife Design Duo: Marie Burgos and Francis Augustine

"Together, we have worked from sketch to production to create the Heritage Collection: a unique, modern compilation of Home decor items that embraces our Martinique origins."
The Tray was brought in the XIX century by the tamil indian to martinique
each inhabitant of the island would use it in its own unique way.
The same way the indians brought the tray to martinique. We wanted to adapt the tray to its new destination, giving it a contemporary twist with clean lines so it could fit more easily into a modern lifestyle.
Size

Size:
40” W x 40” D x 18” H

Finishes:

Walnut - Legs options : Polished Brass, Oiled Bronze, Polished Nickel
product_name: Le Tray Coffee Table / Heritage Collection by Marie Burgos Design
